entry.title: AWS
entry.summary: Setting up and Deploying a Web Page on Amazon Web Services (AWS) Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a collection of remote computing services (also called web services) that make up a cloud computing platform, provided by Amazon.com. In this article, we will show you how to set up and deploy a simple web page on AWS. Prerequisites Before getting started, you’ll need the following: An AWS accou...

entry.title: Azure
entry.summary: Setting up and Deploying a Web Page with Azure Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform and infrastructure created by Microsoft for building, deploying, and managing applications and services through a global network of Microsoft-managed data centers.
